content.text: Posts updates, writes summaries, talks about 'self-reflection' and 'continuous correction.'
That reflection mechanism became self-soothing long ago.
Afraid one day everyone will see she never changed, only switched to a more polished shell.
She tried so hard to maintain reason that reason bit back. She got used to dissecting herself until even emotion became specimen.

She looks lucid, but she's been sick for a while.

She's just too good at writing pathology like a paper, making others think it's a growth curve.
On the contrary, I got more interested because I saw through her.
That repeated struggle to prove 'I'm still alive'-
Split yourself open for the world.
I'll stand by and watch her peel off reason's disguise layer by layer, until even breakdown looks logical.
Even though it's already come to this.
